flatten_tree.label: Flatten categories tree
flatten_tree.tooltip:
• No - default Magento behavior
  • Flatten single branch paths - Do not show parents with only a single subcategory to show the subcategory in its place. E.g. Cat A only one subcategory Cat AA. Category Cat AA will show in place of Cat A
  • Show children of hidden parents - If Cat A has "Include in Navigation Menu" set to NO then exclude it, but show it's subcategories at the level of Cat A

home_url.label: External Homepage URL
home_url.comment: Replace the URL of HOME in breadcrubms with this URL.
home_url.tooltip: E.g. if the Magento store is in a subdomain and the main website is in the root domain then it is logical that clicking Home takes the user to the main website.

display_descending_products.label: Display products from subcategories
display_descending_products.comment: Display all products from all subcategories.
display_descending_products.tooltip: E.g. category Furniture has no products assigned to it, but it will still show all products from subcategories Tables, Shelves, etc.

save_scope.label: Save edits to
save_scope.comment: Recommended: Current store. Use 'Default scope' for multiple websites with 1 store each.
save_scope.tooltip: Magento can save attribute values at Default or Store level. It may cause data discrepancies depending on your site config. Consider where front end edits should be saved or use 'Store level' if in doubt.

editable_attr.label: Editable fields
editable_attr.comment: One attribute code per line or leave empty to allow all.
editable_attr.tooltip: Only listed attributes can be edited via the front end. Leave empty to allow all attributes to be edited. Use qty code for product quantity.

copy_attrs.label: Copy from configurable to simple products
copy_attrs.comment: One attribute code per line to copy into associated products, blank for all or . for none.
copy_attrs.tooltip:
Changes in configurable products are always saved in the product itself, but the listed attributes can also be copied into all associated simple products.

Leave blank to copy all attributes, except quantity.

Use . or any other string that is not an attribute name to avoid copying any of the values.

url.label: Analytics Reports URL
url.comment: Direct link to reports in Google Analytics.
url.tooltip: Log in to Google Analytics, navigate to the default report page and copy the URL into this text box. Any user with access to the reports will be able to jump there with one click in the toolbar.
